post:
Its been some time since we have posted some offer on LET.

Here we go :D

**Germany KVM VPS:**  

**ACN/DEH/LEK2G (LowEnd Exclusive):**  

>**Virtualization** - KVM  
>**Processor** - 2Cores  
>**RAM** - 2GB Dedicated (2GB Swap)  
>**HDD** - 160GB (RAID Protected)  
>**Bandwidth** - 3TB @ 1000Mbps port speed  
>**Windows** - **Allowed Bring Your Own License**  
>**Location** - DE  
>**Quantity** - Limited  
>**Price** - 6$/Month
>**Order** - https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=75  
  
  
**ACN/USNC/2G :**  

>**Virtualization** - OpenVz  
>**Processor** - 4Cores  
>**RAM** - 2GB Dedicated (+1GB vSwap)  
>**HDD** - 100GB (RAID Protected)  
>**Bandwidth** - 1500GB @ 100Mbps port speed  
>**Location** - US NC  
>**Quantity** - Limited  
>**Price** - 4$/Month recurring (use coupon: **LEAPR2G**)  
>**Order** - https://www.aheadcloud.com/billing/cart.php?gid=16   

**Coupons:**

Other Promos

For US VPS

**HALL40** - 3$/Month for 1GB US VPS plan.  
**GIVEME6** - 6$/Month for 2GB US VPS plan.  

Order before all the stock is gone.

Make sure to choose USD as currency while checkout or else you will be charged equivalent amount in Euro.  

You will get Solusvm access after payment so that you can manage the VPS or perform installation of desired OS.  

Payment Mode:

+**Paypal**  
+**Bitcoin**(place order and contact support for payments)  
+**PayuMoney**,**Netbanking** transfers etc.  

If you have any query please drop us a mail.  

Regards
